item.title: As a Porter Among Tables in Postgresql
item.description: Imagine we have two tables, creations and creation_metadata. id of creations table is foreign key of creation_metadata table. They should be one-to-one relation but actually, records in creations table might not have a corresponding row in creation_metadata table. We want to fix this problem and also move some data from creations table to creation_metadata table. Before continuing, letâ€™s make the target clear. What we want is Avoid inserting with existing creation_id in target table.
